name: Dr Linux Rockhoper's slipy slidy adventure in spike temple.
name_original: Dr Linux Rockhoper's slipy slidy adventure in spike temple.
description: This game was created for the GMTK 2020 game jam.  The theme of this jam was "out of control".  When I heard this I asked myself, "what makes me feel out of control when playing a game?".  The answer I came to was lose and slidey controls.  Dr Rockhoper was built around this concept.
